verbs.description: [ARG0: audit] [V: says] [ARG1: lenient jury duty policies for san diego city employees could be wasting taxpayer money san diego city officials are costing taxpayers money by allowing city workers to serve on juries more often than legally required and by not making workers document their jury service according to an investigation by the city auditor fraud jury twitter san diego david garrick sduniontribune com auditor]

audit says lenient jury duty policies for san diego city employees [V: could] be wasting taxpayer money san diego city officials are costing taxpayers money by allowing city workers to serve on juries more often than legally required and by not making workers document their jury service according to an investigation by the city auditor fraud jury twitter san diego david garrick sduniontribune com auditor

audit says lenient jury duty policies for san diego city employees could [V: be] wasting taxpayer money san diego city officials are costing taxpayers money by allowing city workers to serve on juries more often than legally required and by not making workers document their jury service according to an investigation by the city auditor fraud jury twitter san diego david garrick sduniontribune com auditor
